column8:
Hi <Name>,
For your review and signature, please find the <Project Name> public art consulting fee proposal attached.
We look forward to initiating the public art process as follows:
•	Submit Public Art Checklist to the City
•	Preliminary Meeting with City planner and public art coordinator
•	Submit Preliminary Public Art Plan
•	Present Preliminary Public Art Plan at City Public Art Committee Meeting
•	Submit Detailed Public Art Plan
•	Present Detailed Public Art Plan at City Public Art Committee Meeting for Approval
•	Developer Civic Program Contribution 10% 
•	Artist Selection Process
Our next steps involve completing the public art checklist for submission to the City. We will draft the public art checklist and provide it for your review and completion shortly. 
As well, we will request a preliminary meeting with the City public art coordinator to review pertinent project details and discuss the public art vision.
My colleague <Project Coordinator> will be in touch to coordinate the preliminary City meeting.
Please let us know if you have any questions.
Best,
<Your Name>
